description: This file defines the interface for the OttServices plugin exposed via COMRPC. It declares the IOttServices interface with methods for pinging the service, retrieving permissions, invalidating permissions cache, and updating permissions cache, intended for use across process boundaries in a WPEFramework-based system.

classes.name: IOttServices
classes.description: A COMRPC interface for OttServices plugin, inheriting from Core::IUnknown, defining methods for health check and permission management.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Sends a message to the service and expects a pong response.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves permissions for a given application ID as a JSON string.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidates any cached permissions for a specified application ID.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Updates the permission cache for a specified app ID and returns the count of permissions retrieved.

ctags.name: IOttServices
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttServices : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
